column2: "In the atmospherically unstable Dragon Altar, strong thunderclouds appear called cumulus thunderclouds."
"When encountering these clouds, they will cover and darken the sky as far as the eye can see, sounding thunder."
"Plus, huge bolts of lighting will sometimes flash, bringing about lighting strikes..."
"If I could know the features of the clouds near the lighting strikes, then we may be able to avoid the that risk."
"I'm sorry for all of the dangerous investigations. Please get me the data!"
